trans-unit.source: Contains a mapping of one type to another.
The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> class is used to serialize an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> classe é usada para serializar um objeto como XML de SOAP codificado.

trans-unit.source: The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: O XML resultante está em conformidade com a seção 5 do documento na World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org), "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> by calling the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> chamando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> método o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> to construct an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> para construir uma instância do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> classe.

trans-unit.source: To control the serialization, use one of the attributes listed in [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: Para controlar a serialização, use os atributos listados no [atributos que controle codificado serialização SOAP](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes an instance of a class named `Transportation` that contains a field named `Vehicle`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir serializa uma instância de uma classe denominada `Transportation` que contém um campo chamado `Vehicle`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> is applied to the field.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> é aplicada ao campo.

trans-unit.source: When the field is serialized, the XML element name is "Wheels" instead of "Vehicle".
trans-unit.target: Quando o campo é serializado, o nome do elemento XML é "Rodas" em vez de "Vehicle".

trans-unit.source: The `SerializeOverride` method creates a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> and sets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: O `SerializeOverride` método cria um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> e define o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is added to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> that is used to create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> é adicionado a um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> que é usado para criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> is constructed with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>, and an instance of the `Transportation` class is again serialized.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> é construído com a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>e uma instância do `Transportation` classe é serializada novamente.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> is used to override the serialization, the generated XML element name is now "Truck" instead of "Wheels".
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> é usado para substituir a serialização, o nome do elemento XML gerado é agora "Caminhão", em vez de "Rodas".

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified type name that includes the namespace (or namespaces) and type.
The fully qualified type name.
trans-unit.target: O nome de tipo totalmente qualificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type name of the mapped object.
The type name of the mapped object.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo do objeto mapeado.

trans-unit.source: The type name is the class name of the mapped object.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo é o nome da classe do objeto mapeado.

trans-unit.source: You can also see the fully qualified name by examining the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeFullName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode ver o nome totalmente qualificado, examinando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeFullName%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML element name of the mapped object.
The XML element name of the mapped object.
trans-unit.target: O nome do elemento XML do objeto mapeado.

trans-unit.source: The default is the class name of the object.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o nome da classe do objeto.

trans-unit.source: To set an alternate element name of an object, apply a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> to the class, and set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.TypeName%2A> property to a new value.
trans-unit.target: Para definir um nome de elemento alternativo de um objeto, aplicar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> para a classe e defina o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.TypeName%2A> propriedade para um novo valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML namespace of the mapped object.
The XML namespace of the mapped object.
trans-unit.target: O namespace XML do objeto mapeado.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: To set a namespace name of an object, apply a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> to the class, and set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.Namespace%2A> property to a new value.
trans-unit.target: Para definir um nome de namespace de um objeto, aplicar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> para a classe e defina o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.Namespace%2A> propriedade para um novo valor.
